faultTypeRule.ocl: Assignment.allInstances()->select(varAssignmentWithLiteral | --Scope Conditions let litToChange: ASTNode = varAssignmentWithLiteral.rightHandSide in litToChange <> null and (litToChange.oclIsKindOf(StringLiteral) or litToChange.oclIsKindOf(CharacterLiteral) or litToChange.oclIsKindOf(NumberLiteral) or litToChange.oclIsKindOf(BooleanLiteral)) ) ->reject(node: ASTNode | node.originalCompilationUnit.oclIsUndefined()) ->reject(node: ASTNode | node->closure(oclContainer())->exists(oclIsKindOf(Javadoc)))
